statements.update: UPDATE HM_BOARDMGT SET BOARDNM = #BOARDNM#, BOARDNOTE = #BOARDNOTE#, FILEYN = #FILEYN#, READAUTHCODE = #READAUTHCODE#, WRITEAUTHCODE = #WRITEAUTHCODE#, ORD = #ORD#, USEYN = #USEYN#, FILEEXTENTION = #FILEEXTENTION#, MAILYN = #MAILYN#, MAILADDRESS = #MAILADDRESS#, HOMEYN = #HOMEYN#, MAXFILESIZE = #MAXFILESIZE#, OASISYN = #OASISYN# WHERE BOARDCD = #BOARDCD#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT BOARDCD, CONTENTCD, TITLE, CONTENT, EMPNO, EMPNM, INDT, CGDT, READCNT ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY BOARDCD, CONTENTCD ORDER BY BOARDCD, CONTENTCD) AS ROW_NUM FROM HM_BOARDCONTENT WHERE 1=1
BOARDCD = #BOARDCD#
CONTENTCD = #CONTENTCD#
)

SELECT BOARDCD, CONTENTCD, TITLE, CONTENT, EMPNO, EMPNM, INDT, CGDT, TO_CHAR(READCNT) AS READCNT, TO_CHAR(ROW_NUM) AS ROW_NUM, OASISSTATUS, OASISDOCSID, OASISDOCUID, TO_CHAR(REPLYCNT) REPLYCNT, READAUTHCODE, ALWAYSONTOP, CATEGORY FROM ( SELECT A.BOARDCD, A.CONTENTCD, A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.EMPNO, A.EMPNM, A.INDT, A.CGDT, A.READCNT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY A.BOARDCD, A.CONTENTCD ORDER BY A.BOARDCD, A.CONTENTCD) AS ROW_NUM , B.OASISSTATUS , B.OASISDOCSID , B.OASISDOCUID , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HM_BOARDREPLY WHERE A.BOARDCD = BOARDCD(+) AND A.CONTENTCD = CONTENTCD(+)) AS REPLYCNT , A.READAUTHCODE , A.ALWAYSONTOP , A.CATEGORY FROM HM_BOARDCONTENT A , ( SELECT BOARDCD, CONTENTCD, OASISSTATUS, OASISDOCSID, OASISDOCUID FROM ( SELECT BOARDCD, CONTENTCD, OASISSTATUS, OASISDOCSID, OASISDOCUID , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY BOARDCD, CONTENTCD ORDER BY SDATE DESC) ROW_NUM FROM HM_BOARDREPORT@TECH.WORLD WHERE 1=1
BOARDCD = #BOARDCD#
CONTENTCD = #CONTENTCD#
) WHERE ROW_NUM=1 ) B WHERE 1=1 AND A.BOARDCD = B.BOARDCD(+) AND A.CONTENTCD = B.CONTENTCD(+)
A.BOARDCD = #BOARDCD#
A.CONTENTCD = #CONTENTCD#
A.BOARDCD IN (SELECT BOARDCD FROM HM_BOARDMGT WHERE HOMEYN = #HOMEYN#)
A.INDT BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 365, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
( A.TITLE LIKE '%'||#TITLECONTENTLIKE#||'%' OR A.CONTENT LIKE '%'||#TITLECONTENTLIKE#||'%' )
A.TITLE LIKE '%'||#TITLELIKE#||'%'
A.EMPNM LIKE '%'||#EMPNMLIKE#||'%'
A.INDT LIKE '%'||#INDT#||'%'
A.CATEGORY = #CATEGORY#
)
WHERE ROW_NUM <= #LIMIT#
ORDER BY ALWAYSONTOP DESC, TO_NUMBER(CONTENTCD) DESC
